text: 60|12|o; nabi, allahuveat yateannineyum pankucerkkukayillennum, meastikkukayillennum, vyabhicarikkukayillennum, tannalute makkale keannukalayukayillennum, tannalute kaikalukalkkitayil vyajavadam ketticcamaccu keantuvarikayillennum, yatearu nallakaryattilum ninneat anusaranakket kanikkukayillennum ninneat pratijna ceytukeant satyavisvasinikal ninre atutt vannal ni avarute pratijna svikarikkukayum, avarkku venti papameacanam tetukayum ceyyuka. tirccayayum allahu ere pearukkunnavanum karunanidhiyumakunnu
